price: نو اوس چې درواغ يې وګڼلو ډېر زر به د هغه څه خبرونه ورته راشي چې ملنډې به يې پرې وهلې.
arabic: فَقَدۡ كَذَّبُواْ فَسَيَأۡتِيهِمۡ أَنۢبَٰٓؤُاْ مَا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ يَسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: faqad kadhabū fasayatīhim anbāu mā kānū bihi yastahziūna
